Title: Minnesota immigration crackdown will end, border czar says. And, DHS funding to expire
Description:
Border czar Tom Homan announced that the Trump administration will end the immigration crackdown in Minnesota.
And, DHS funding is set to expire after lawmakers failed to advance a spending bill.

Title: OpenAI is officially killing GPT-4o and users are freaking out (again): 'People are in absolute crisis'
Description: OpenAI has retired its popular ChatGPT model GPT-4o, sparking another backlash from users who had developed an emotional attachment to the bot.
